```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringi)
library(ggthemes)
library(cowplot)
library(ggpubr)
library(paletteer)
library(viridis)
```

```{r}
passwords <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-01-14/passwords.csv')
```

```{r}
passwords <- passwords %>% 
  drop_na()
```

```{r}
x <- c(seq(1,10), seq(2,11), seq(3,11), seq(4,10))

# x <- c(seq(1,10), seq(1.5,10.5), seq(2,11), seq(2.5,9.5))

y <- c(rep(4, times = 10), rep(3, times = 10), rep(2, times = 9), rep(1, times = 7))

order <- c("1", "2", "3", "4", "5", "6", "7", "8", "9", "0", "q", "w", "e", "r", "t", "y", "u", "i", "o", "p", "a", "s", "d", "f", "g", "h", "j", "k", "l", "z", "x", "c", "v", "b", "n", "m")

order2 <- c(seq(1,36))

order <- enframe(order) %>% 
  select(value) %>% 
  add_column(order = order2)

freq <- passwords %>% 
  pull(password) %>% 
  strsplit(split = "") %>% 
  unlist() %>% 
  table() %>% 
  as.tibble() %>% 
  clean_names() %>%
  rename("character" = x) %>% 
  left_join(order, by = c("character" = "value")) %>% 
  arrange(order) %>% 
  add_column(x = x, y = y)
```

```{r palette}
palette <- paletteer_c("viridis::magma", 400)

paletteer_d(viri)
```

```{r}
ggplot(freq,aes(x, y))+
  geom_tile(aes(x, y, fill = n))+
  geom_text(aes(label = character), color = "black")+
  theme_void()+
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom", 
    text = element_text(family = "Roboto Slab"),
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.1, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(hjust = 0.02),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#f5deb3"),
    # plot.caption = element_text(margin = margin(b = , r = -15)),
    panel.grid.major = element_line(colour = "transparent"),
    plot.margin = unit(c(1, 1, 1, 1), 'cm')
    # plot.subtitle = element_text(margin = margin(t = 5, b = 10))
    )+
  scale_fill_paletteer_c("grDevices::Blue-Red 3")+
  labs(title = "Which keys are the most common for passwords on a keyboard?", subtitle = "In the 500 most popular passwords",fill = "", caption = "Data: http://bit.ly/KIB_PopularPasswords \n@Rzeugnisse")
```
